title: Ek Farzi Love Story
overview: Two contrasting worlds collide when an aspiring content creator Kritika and social media-averse CA, Manav find themselves stuck together thanks to an unexpected encounter. A viral video of their unique banter becomes the foundation of an unconventional partnership, where they have nothing in common, common except the fact that they agree to disagree on everything. As they become unlikely best friends offline, they pretend to be a fake couple online for the sake of their followers, who perceive them as a couple and as their fandom explodes they become an internet sensation.
